CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV leaves MOT and CHI in room and closes door behind her as she exits
CHI is jumping up trying to see himself in the two-way mirror
MOT walks over to boxes on desk
MOT walks over to CHI and picks him up so he can see himself in mirror
CHI looks at himself in mirror
MOT looks at CHI's image in the mirror and smiles
CHI looks at himself and smiles
CHI slaps his hand against the mirror
MOT walks over toward desk with boxes on it
<$=1> MOT looks at boxes on table
MOT slides CHI out of her arms and stands him on the floor
MOT starts to walk over toward the desk
CHI slides out of MOT's arms
CHI bounces as his feet hit the floor

e.ga: on the floor in front of the camera

u.a: MOT walks back to center of room with Box 1 in hand
MOT looks at book lying in box
<bef> CHI takes book out of box
MOT takes box and cover and lays them aside
MOT looks at box and cover
CHI looks at box and cover
CHI looks at book in his hands
MOT slides up against wall and leans on it
MOT grabs CHI under arms and seats him beside herself
<2-3> CHI lays book on MOT's lap
MOT takes the book and puts one arm around CHI holding the book in front of CHI
CHI points to picture on book cover
MOT points to picture on book cover
MOT points out pictures on book cover
CHI continues to look at book . CHI is leaning against MOT
<bef> MOT opens book up and begins to read to CHI
MOT circles picture in book with her finger
<aft> MOT cuddles her head up against CHI's head
CHI starts to point to a picture
<8-9 .> MOT quickly glances at infant in bassinet
throughout this discourse infant occasionally coos and cries
infant placed off camera in bassinet
MOT looks at book and points to pictures in book
CHI is looking attentively at book as MOT reads
MOT turns quickly to look at CHI
CHI turns quickly and looks at MOT
<aft> MOT gently kisses CHI on the forehead
CHI is looking around the room
CHI is looking at book in MOT's lap
CHI lifts up page in book
CHI points to picture in book
infant in corner of the room cries
MOT leans over and touches infant
MOT slides the bassinet closer to her
CHI takes book off of MOT's lap
infant in bassinet is out of camera view
CHI points to picture in book which is now on his lap
MOT turns her gaze back and forth between infant in bassinet and CHI next to her
MOT points to the same picture
CHI studies page and then points to picture
MOT circles the pictures on opposite page
CHI shakes his head in a negative manner
CHI points to picture then looks up at MOT
MOT reaches over and touches infant in bassinet
CHI taps his finger over picture several times
CHI looks up from book wide-eyed
MOT brushes her fingers through CHI's hair
MOT is glancing up at ceiling
CHI turns over book in his lap
CHI looks at book in his hands
MOT reaches for book in CHI's arms
CHI stands up and walks away from MOT . CHI looks at MOT
CHI looks at book then at MOT
CHI walks back over to MOT until their heads are touching
CHI puts the book on his top of his head
MOT kisses CHI as their heads touch
MOT opens up book on her lap
CHI lunges forward and lies on MOT's legs
MOT is looking at pages in book
CHI comes to his knees and watches MOT read
CHI starts to slide on his knees closer to MOT
CHI looks up at MOT and shakes his head no
MOT leans over and touches infant in bassinet
MOT cuddles CHI closer to herself and starts to pat him on the buttocks
MOT is pointing to pictures with one hand and touching infant with the other as she looks back and forth between both
MOT taps picture with her finger
CHI points to himself and continues to look at book
MOT brushes her fingers through CHI's hair
MOT shakes her head in a negative fashion
CHI is smiling and starts to come to his knees
MOT leans over and lays her head on CHI's head
<$=3> MOT brushes her fingers through CHI's hair
CHI has been looking attentively at book in MOT's lap
CHI starts to turn the back cover
MOT flips back cover over to look at it
MOT shakes her head in a negative fashion
CHI quickly comes to his knees
MOT holds book out to CHI
CHI leans over MOT's outstretched legs and lies down on them
MOT pushes CHI's legs over his head and he somersaults to the floor
MOT tickles CHI lying on the floor
MOT holds book out to CHI
MOT puts empty box in front of CHI
MOT stands up and walks over to desk
CHI puts book in box and attempts to put cover on
MOT gets Box 2 from the desk and brings it over to center of room where she drops it on the floor
CHI takes box from MOT and brings it over to desk
CHI has pushed box too far and it has fallen off the back end of the desk
CHI walks over to MOT and box in center of the room
MOT looks closely at contents of box
CHI picks up Cookie Monster puppet in his left hand
CHI picks up bird puppet with his right hand
MOT goes to grab bird puppet out of CHI's hand but CHI does not let go
CHI drops bird puppet to the floor and slides Cookie Monster puppet onto his left hand
MOT leans over CHI's shoulder to observe him putting on puppet
MOT looks over CHI's shoulder at the puppet
CHI slides puppet off of his hand
MOT looks closely at puppet in CHI's hand
<bef> CHI looks up to the ceiling

g.ga: object inside of Cookie Monster puppet

u.a: <bef> CHI slips puppet back onto his hand . CHI opens and closes puppet's mouth
CHI starts to use his hand to open and close puppet's mouth as he talks
MOT sticks her index finger out in front of puppet's mouth
CHI has puppet's mouth grab MOT's finger and shake it
MOT slips bird puppet onto her hand
CHI holds puppet on his hand up in front of the puppet MOT now has on her hand
MOT holds puppet on her hand up and opens and closes its mouth
MOT looks at puppet on her hand
smiling and looking at puppet on his hand
MOT lays her hand with the puppet on it in the empty box bottom on the floor
CHI watches MOT and scoots closer to her
CHI lays his hand with the puppet on it in the empty box cover laying on the floor
MOT lifts hand with puppet on it up
MOT looks at puppet and then at CHI
CHI lifts puppet out of box
MOT pretends to put shoes on her puppet
CHI shakes his hand with puppet on it from side to side and then imitates MOT's actions as she puts clothes on her puppet
CHI turns puppet around and pretends to put clothes on it
CHI looks at his puppet <aft> CHI looks at MOT
CHI restlessly bounces up and down
MOT holds her puppet's wing out to CHI's puppet
CHI shakes bird puppet's wing with his puppet's mouth
CHI looks at puppet and then at MOT
MOT points to corner of the room
CHI pretends to pick up can(s) of soda
MOT takes the empty box bottom and turns it upside down then lays it on her lap
CHI lays his puppet on the box
CHI makes sounds as if munching on food
CHI puts puppet's mouth on pretend table and has it gulp down pretend food
MOT makes sounds as if munching on food
MOT has her puppet gulp down pretend food
CHI plops back down on the floor and begins shaking his hand with puppet on it side to side . puppet slips off of CHI's hand
MOT points to each puppet respectively
CHI hands Cookie Monster puppet to MOT
MOT slips bird puppet off of her hand and hands it to CHI
<aft> MOT slips Cookie Monster puppet onto her hand
CHI slips puppet onto his hand
MOT slips puppet off of her hand momentarily
<aft> MOT briefly glances inside puppet and makes a funny face
MOT slips puppet back onto her hand
MOT holds up puppet and begins to move mouth open and close
MOT watches CHI with bird puppet on his hand
CHI looks at bird puppet on his hand
CHI tries to open puppets mouth
<$=1> MOT examines puppet on CHI's hand
CHI leans backwards so that the puppet MOT is examining slips off of his hand
<aft> CHI picks Cookie Monster puppet up from the floor
MOT slips bird puppet onto her hand
CHI slips Cookie Monster puppet onto his hand
CHI looks at MOT then at his puppet
CHI looks intently at puppet on his hand
MOT grabs CHI by the leg and pulls him across floor closer to herself
CHI slips puppet off of his hand
MOT takes puppet from CHI and turns it inside out and examines it
MOT points to piece of plastic
CHI stares intently at piece of plastic
MOT slips puppet onto her hand
CHI grabs puppet on MOT's hand
MOT slides puppet off of her hand and onto CHI's hand
MOT slips bird puppet onto her hand and then has puppet nibble at CHI's forehead
CHI backs away from MOT and toward bassinet where he looks at infant
CHI has his puppet nibble at toes of infant
MOT has her puppet nibble at toes of infant
MOT holds puppet out in front of infant
<1-2> CHI looks at MOT . <3-6> CHI looks at his puppet
MOT moves out of camera view

g.ga: in far corner of the room

u.a: <bef> CHI looks over to far corner of the room and then points to that area

e.ga: in far corner of the room

u.a: CHI anxiously scoots over toward far corner of the room
MOT holds up her arm at a 90 degree angle
CHI stops and looks back at MOT
MOT places her hand with bird puppet on it on her arm which is at 90 degree angle and swings the puppet back and forth
CHI slides on the floor over toward MOT
MOT holds her arm out toward CHI
CHI lays his hand with puppet on it on MOT's arm
CHI looks at MOT's puppet then looks at MOT
MOT leans over closer to CHI and looks at CHI
CHI pushes MOT's arm back and forth
MOT swings her arm back and forth holding her puppet next to her moving arm
MOT stops swinging her arm and holds up her puppet
CHI drops his puppet on MOT's arm and pushes her arm downward
MOT drops her chin to her chest
MOT looks at puppet and then at CHI
CHI leans back onto the floor and shakes puppet on his hand from side to side near infant
CHI sits up and looks at MOT
CHI moves puppet through the air
CHI stops singing and slides puppet off of his hand
<aft> CHI looks intently inside of puppet
CHI puts his hand inside of puppet
MOT reaches over and touches puppet's mouth
MOT is still out of camera view
CHI reaches out and touches bird puppet
CHI looks at box then at MOT
MOT takes empty box bottom on the floor and places it in front of herself
CHI scoots up to empty box cover on the floor
MOT lays bird puppet in the empty box bottom
CHI lays Cookie Monster puppet in empty box cover
MOT pretends to put covers up
CHI takes his hand out of puppet and rearranges it in the box cover
CHI pats his puppet in box
MOT pats bird puppet imitating CHI's action
CHI pretends to put covers up imitating MOT's actions
MOT pretends to put cover up on bird puppet again imitating CHI's action
CHI looks at MOT's puppet in it's box
MOT puts puppets in empty box
MOT lays box cover on top of box
<aft> MOT stands up and walks over to desk
CHI slides cover down upon box
MOT walks back to center of room with Box 3 in her hands
CHI walks over to desk and places Box 2 on top of it
MOT drops box onto floor in center of the room
CHI quickly walks back to center of room
MOT grabs CHI under his arms and turns him around to face camera
MOT sets CHI down on the floor
CHI looks delightedly at contents of box
MOT looks at contents of box
MOT picks up a crayon from out of the box
CHI looks up at MOT then at crayon in MOT's hand
CHI looks at MOT . <aft> CHI looks at crayon
MOT stretches out her leg in front of herself and holds the crayon up beside her shoe
<bef> CHI looks at MOT's shoes . CHI shakes his head
MOT holds crayon out to CHI
MOT lifts paper out of the box
CHI picks up piece of paper from out of box
CHI lays paper on the floor between his legs and begins to draw on it

g.ga: paper which was lying in box

u.a: MOT takes empty box cover and turns it upside down next to CHI . MOT taps cover
CHI is intently drawing on paper on the floor

g.ga: paper on which CHI is drawing

u.a: MOT grabs CHI's paper and tries to put is on the upside down box

g.ga: drawing on piece of paper in CHI's hand

u.a: MOT takes empty box bottom and turns it upside down and places it in front of herself then puts paper and crayons on top of it
<$=3> MOT leans over CHI and goes to grab the paper
<$=1> MOT puts piece of paper on top of upside down box cover
CHI starts to draw on paper now on top of box
CHI lays crayon he has been drawing with on box in front of MOT
MOT leans her head on her hand and watches CHI over her shoulder
MOT leans forward and points to drawing
MOT is leaning over CHI looking at drawing
CHI hunches over paper and draws intently for a few seconds
CHI looks over at other crayons next to MOT then turns back to his drawing
MOT reaches behind CHI to bassinet and cuddles infant's toes
CHI turns and puts his crayon on box in front of MOT
MOT picks up a crayon and begins to draw on CHI's paper
CHI draws on paper with MOT
CHI leans back from his drawing and looks at it
MOT reaches behind CHI and puts pacifier in infant's mouth
CHI crawls over to paper on box cover in front of MOT
MOT taps paper in front of her and watches CHI
CHI starts to put crayons and paper away
MOT helps CHI put crayons and paper in box
MOT takes box cover and hands it to CHI
CHI attempts to put cover on box
<aft> MOT helps CHI put cover on box
end of PCI - Crayons and Paper
CHI quickly stands up and walks over to desk
MOT holds box out to CHI
CHI takes box and brings it over to desk
CHI takes box from desk and carries it over to MOT sitting on floor in center of room
CHI drops to the floor with box in hands
CHI starts to pull flaps of box open
MOT helps CHI pull flaps open
MOT holds box while CHI pulls
CHI leans back and watches MOT
MOT positions herself over box and grabs it
MOT pulls box in one direction
CHI pulls house in opposite direction
MOT helps CHI pull house out of box
CHI leans back and looks at house
MOT leans over house grabs the handle and the house opens

g.ga: in the front of the house

u.a: MOT picks up doll and pretends it walks to the door
MOT opens house up to expose interior
MOT looks at interior of house
MOT grabs CHI by the leg and slides him across floor closer to house
CHI looks at interior of house
MOT positions house in front of CHI
CHI starts to take play pieces out of house
CHI looks at inside of the house
MOT leans over behind CHI and puts pacifier in infant's mouth
CHI is playing with play pieces
MOT rests her chin on her hand and sits beside CHI watching his play
